There is a branch that implements the Pade approximation to the matrix exponential in pure tensorflow, but it is untested.

body:
There is a branch that implements the Pade approximation to the matrix
exponential in pure tensorflow, but it is untested.

On Thu, Jul 12, 2018 at 4:22 AM, Ceveloper <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I'm also interested in the gradient implementation of the matrix
> exponential op. Has someone implemented it yet? Are there works in progress
> for future releases?
>
> —
